title: Minimalist Scandinavian House with Private Garden Near Waterfront
description: This six-bedroom Scandinavian-inspired house balances space and simplicity. Natural light pours into an open-plan living area with clean design cues and calming whites. Three stylish bathrooms meet modern needs while a private garden offers fresh air for family gatherings, work, or relaxation.
neighborhood_description: Set in Suburb, Nowy Sacz, this eco-conscious enclave is mere steps from the serene waterfront. Residents enjoy peace and nature, expanding outdoor opportunities within a thoughtful community driven by green living initiatives. Proximity to highway access supports easy travel around the region.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to waterfront walks or runs
room for creativity and family life
target_buyer: Remote professionals and digital nomads with families prioritizing balance of nature, community, and flexible working from a spacious, light-filled home.
market_positioning: Distinct within the local market for blending functional minimalism, dedicated family/play areas, and workspace flexibility, all positioned within an eco-conscious riverside neighborhood.
